name: Diamond and Emerald Necklace with Earrings, Bracelet and Ring
description: Stunning diamond and emerald necklace with earrings, bracelet and ring.

name: Tourmaline, Pearl and Uncut Diamond Royal Single String
description: Single string necklace comprising of tourmaline, pearl and uncut diamonds.

name: Regal Blue Sapphire and Diamond Necklace
description: Splendid line of diamonds and blue sapphires arranged in the most kingly design.

name: Majestic Ruby and Diamond Single Line Necklace with Earrings
description: A splendid array of rubies and diamonds in a single line; beautifully paired with earrings.

name: Pristine Yellow Sapphire & Diamond Necklace with Yellow Sapphire and Diamond Earrings
description: This majestic necklace and pair of earrings are made for the royal 'you'. The line is decorated with rare yellow sapphires and diamonds, making it luminous beyond words. Customization available.

name: Elegant Emerald & Diamond Necklace with Earrings, Ring and Bracelet
description: A surreal set with a bespoke collection of emeralds and diamonds. Styled in a 'chokar' setting, this set is perfect for an elegant evening. Customization available.

name: Traditional Emerald Necklace
description: This epic design is for those traditional affairs that you just cannot miss. An exclusive collection of emeralds and diamonds, in a traditional setting, making it a versatile piece in your wardrobe. Customization available.

name: Grand Diamond and Pearl Necklace
description: This statement piece is a premium design made of diamonds and pearls in three layers. The design falls slender on the neck. You cannot take your eyes off it. Customization available.

name: Epic Diamond Quad-Necklace with Bracelet
description: An enchanting design of diamonds in quad-layers accompanied with a bracelet. The outstanding bracelet can be worn as a solo show-stopper as well. Customization available.

name: Heart Shaped Ruby Necklace with Double Diamond Layer
description: This rustic piece is charmer. With a single line of heart shaped rubies, and two lines of round diamonds; this design makes you skip a heart beat. Customization available.

name: Heart Shaped Emerald & Diamond Earrings and Ring
description: Heart-shaped emeralds aligned with diamonds in a falling-string design, is sure to sweep you off your feet. The tender intricacy of the design, is complimented with a ring in the same design. Customization available.

name: Ecstatic Blue Sapphire & Round Diamond Single Line Necklace
description: This bestseller has an old-world charm, with round diamonds in a single,wavy line with blue sapphire droplets. Customization available.

name: Surreal Emerald & Diamond Necklace with Earrings, Bracelet, Ring
description: This set is a royal affair, you cannot afford to miss. An exclusive, regal necklace with emeralds and diamonds accompanied with earrings, ring and bracelet.
